data.title: Xbox Games developed by Taito
data.meta_description: Compare Xbox scores for all the games developed by Taito. Register now to see yours!
data.text:
Easy Gamerscore: 42 quick completions from this week's Xbox sale

A new Xbox sale has arrived, bringing with it a bunch of cheap and easy Gamerscore! Here are all the quick completions on offer this week.

Posted 1 month ago by Sean Carey

We've dug through this week's Xbox sale to find the treasures it's hiding, and have found plenty of quick completions for all your easy Gamerscore needs.

Posted 1 month ago by Tom West
